e="preserve">Be Alright is an R&B house song by Ariana Grande. The song was part of the Dangerous Woman album. The song is about being hopeful and looking forward to better days.
The song was first performed on Saturday Night Live on March 12.
Ariana Grande was accused of copying the 2015 song "Firefly" by Mura Masa and Nao. Some fans and critics pointed out that the songs sounded similar.
